title: Someone's Been Sleeping in My Bed
description: ONCE A UPON A TIME ... THEY LIVED HAPPILY EVER AFTER ...WHO'S BEEN EATING FROM MY BOWL?IS SHE A BEAUTY IN BOTH HEART AND SOUL?WHO'S BEEN SITTING IN MY CHAIR?IS SHE PRETTY OF FACE AND FAIR OF HAIR?WHO'S BEEN SLEEPING IN MY BED?IS SHE THE DAMSEL I WILL WED?The golden-haired woman had barely escaped from a stagecoach robbery before she got lost in the Wyoming mountains. Hungry, harried, and out of hope, she stumbled on a rude cabin, the home of three brothers, great bears of men who nearly frightened her out of her wits. But Maddalyn Kelly was no Goldilocks; she was a feisty beauty who could fend for herself. Still, how could she ever have guessed that the Barrett boys would bare their souls to her --- or that one of them would share with her an ecstasy so exquisite it was almost unbearable?
author: Linda Winstead Jones
